thread.title: Scoot Unleashes New Four-Wheeler Quad Cars On San Francisco Streets

author: newsr.in
title: Scoot Unleashes New Four-Wheeler Quad Cars On San Francisco Streets
text: Scoot, the San Francisco-based electric scooter ride share network, has teamed up with Nissan to create a four-wheeled two-seater enclosed vehicle onto the streets of San Francisco. Starting today, Scoot members have the option to rent one of these adorable little cars to get them anywhere in the 7×7. Known as the Scoot Quad, this is an all-electric vehicle that you can turn on with the… Read More »
